RxML.TEXT: <gender>Female</gender> <age>19-24</age> <treatment_length>1 to 6 months</treatment_length> <satisfaction>2</satisfaction> <effectiveness>3</effectiveness> <condition>Condition: Absence of Menstrual Periods</condition> <comment>So I started taking Junel because I was having difficulty getting my period and my doctor told me it would regulate it. I have been taking it for a month and I have had severe vaginal bleeding I have been very depressed to the point I don't want to get out of bed on some days My moods changed and everything irritates me and not to mention my sex drive decreased... Has anyone encountered these side effects.</comment>
